articles.author: Ben Rogerson
articles.title: “It's like having your own James Bond theme. They'll play that at my funeral one day”: Eddie Murphy on Axel F, which has been re-recorded using the original synths for Netflix's new Beverly Hills Cop movie - MusicRadar
articles.description: “We went right back to the origins by getting the same instruments that were playing it, the same sounds,” says composer Lorne Balfe
articles.content: Axel Foley is back in Netflix’s new Beverly Hills Cop movie, and so is Harold Faltermeyer’s iconic theme of the same name. “It’s like having your own James Bond theme,” says Eddie Murphy, who played … [+3216 chars]

articles.author: Marcus Wratten
articles.title: The Sandman creator Neil Gaiman denies sexual assault claims - PinkNews
articles.description: Neil Gaiman, the creator of queer favourite including The Sandman and Good Omens, has denied allegations of sexual assault by two women.
articles.content:
Neil Gaiman, the creator of queer favourite comics and TV series including The Sandman and Good Omens, has denied allegations of sexual assault brought by two women.
